mapper.sql: carousel_id, carousel_url, redirect_url, carousel_rank, is_deleted, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user
mapper.select: select carousel_id, carousel_url, redirect_url, carousel_rank, is_deleted, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user from tb_recommend_carousel where carousel_id = #{carouselId}
select from tb_recommend_carousel where is_deleted = 0 order by carousel_rank desc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_recommend_carousel(carousel_url, redirect_url, carousel_rank, is_deleted, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user) values (#{carouselUrl}, #{redirectUrl}, #{carouselRank}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUser})

insert into tb_recommend_carousel(carousel_url, redirect_url, carousel_rank, is_deleted, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user) values
(#{entity.carouselUrl}, #{entity.redirectUrl}, #{entity.carouselRank}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createUser}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.updateUser})

insert into tb_recommend_carousel(carousel_url, redirect_url, carousel_rank, is_deleted, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user) values
(#{entity.carouselUrl}, #{entity.redirectUrl}, #{entity.carouselRank}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createUser}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.updateUser})
on duplicate key update carousel_url = values(carousel_url), redirect_url = values(redirect_url), carousel_rank = values(carousel_rank), is_deleted = values(is_deleted), create_time = values(create_time), create_user = values(create_user), update_time = values(update_time), update_user = values(update_user)
mapper.update:
update tb_recommend_carousel
carousel_url = #{carouselUrl},
redirect_url = #{redirectUrl},
carousel_rank = #{carouselRank},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_user = #{createUser},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_user = #{updateUser},
where carousel_id = #{carouselId}
